description.value: Multiply Relevent Characteristic Bonus by X, Unnatural Agility does not affect movement, as this is based on base agility. During Opposed Characteristic Tests, gain a free number of Degrees of Success equal to the multiplier X. Examples: Unnatural Strength, Toughness, Agility, Intelligence, Perception,Willpower, Fellowship, and Speed.
